text: The 1985–86 Biathlon World Cup was a multi-race tournament over a season of biathlon, organised by the UIPMB (Union Internationale de Pentathlon Moderne et Biathlon). The season started on 16 January 1986 in Antholz-Anterselva, Italy, and ended on 16 March 1986 in Boden, Sweden. It was the ninth season of the Biathlon World Cup. ==Calendar== Below is the World Cup calendar for the 1985–86 season. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Location ! Date ! Individual ! Sprint !
